qas.question: Along with urban adult contemporary and smooth jazz, what station format might feature music from Sade?
What other format is sometimes played on urban AC stations?
When might you hear smooth jazz on a soft AC station?
What is a more recent name for the smooth jazz format?
What was the smooth jazz format renamed?

context: Anita Baker, Sade, Regina Belle, and Luther Vandross are other examples of artists who appeal to <a0_0>mainstream AC<a0_0/>, urban AC and <a1_0>smooth jazz<a1_0/> listeners. Some soft AC and urban AC stations like to play smooth jazz on <a2_0>the weekends<a2_0/>. In recent years, the Smooth Jazz format has been renamed to <a3_0>Smooth AC<a3_0/>, as an attempt <a4_0>to lure younger listeners<a4_0/>.
